title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Paradoxically, you can learn more by teaching today. Sometimes, the best way to improve what you shakily know is to firm it up not only with practice, but by explaining it in detail to someone else. You may receive a real shot of confidence when you see how well you understand the subject as you give your own take on the significant points. Likewise, an intelligent ally could bring up valuable information on a topic that you thought you knew well, but you still can gain insight from a fresh perspective. Caring is sharing, especially when its knowledge. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
